about_the_game:
This DLC is currently not available within the Unreal Table Ball Demo

Colour Pack 3

Do you want to customise your bumpers and balls?

WELL NOW YOU CAN

Features

New Colours

4 new colours to choose from.

Wanting a nice sun yellow ball? Well you can have that.

Want your bumpers to be pearl green? You can do that too

Want your bumpers to be emerald green while your ball is claret violet? OF COURSE YOU CAN.

What colours are included?

Sun Yellow, Pearl Green, Emerald Green and Claret Violet

Klooloo awaits :)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2330M
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • Additional Notes: None

  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • Additional Notes: None

  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2330M
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 Graphics

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8145U
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Quadro 2000
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • Additional Notes: None

short_description: The Table Ball - Colour Pack 3 adds four different colours that can be used to customise your Table Ball experience. Make your bumpers and balls Sun Yellow, Pearl Green, Emerald Green or Claret Violet, it's all up to you in the Table Ball - Colour Pack 3
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Swedish
